July 30, 2020 Hygienic Touchless Restaurant Experiences
Are your customers looking for ways to bring low or no touch experiences to their restaurant? NCR Mobile Pay for Aloha makes paying the check fast, easy, and completely contactless. All guests need are a QR code and their phone – it’s that simple. Share this video <[[https://youtu.be/mpCC5niwjvQ]]> with operators to demonstrate how NCR Mobile Pay provides a hygienic touchless experience that can help keep their guests and staff safe.
